description: Traditional rubber boots are made for fishing boats. Sure they’ll keep feet dry, but they’re heavy, clumsy and end up smelling a bit clammy. Dakine's Slush Sports are made for mountains, and are the first waterproof boot built for performance. With a sneaker-like contoured fit and a lightweight cushioned EVA midsole they’ll never slow you down, whether at play or aprés.
name: Dakine Slush Sport - Mens
